comment.author: 30423736@N06
comment._content: Here is a wonderful film of Torquay, Devon (1924) from the BFI's archives. It is part of their online playlist 'The Open Road - a cinematic postcard of Britain in the 1920s'. Alternatively, follow this link to watch the footage: uk.youtube.com/watch?v=lEK2qeuoNVg
